Blog.post: I just want to say hi to anyone who is actually reading this. (thank you - you have saved my life) Now I know that someone is reading this, i will continue to type in random stuff. If you are not reading this, please tell me!! Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. Of course you are reading it. No i am not being big headed or top heavy. You would have had to read it to tell me that you wern't reading it!!!! My logic works, and makes me really happy. lalalalalalalalalalalalalalalalalala raaaaa heeheeheeheeheeheehahahahahahahohohohohohohohoh ok to tell you the truth, i have only typed up this pile of random poo to make my blog look like it has lots of posts on it, when it really doesn't!!!! ok gtgn, (that means got to go now) cya luke

I am still changing things around on my site. I hope everything will be finished quite soon. The new font and the backgrounds e.t.c take a little while to change over. If you have any comments, queries, likes, dislikes, carrots, no not carrots, drop me a line. ok this is quite a short post, but never mind. probaly more soon.

Forget what was on the first list, so i cannot write up the 2nd list 7. Laugh 8. Look out of the window 9. Answer to the name of lemon 10. Sing the carry on Jimbob song 11. Pretend you are an immortal moron! (I don't need to do this one, because i am!!!!!)

Hello Welcome to my new blog!!!!!!!!! I will be using it to tell the whole world what's new on lukewarner. tk (If u don't know, then that is my site, and in case you didn't know my name is Luke warner, e.g. lukewarner.tk blog name lukewarner!!!!)I will be also using it to tell people random things like my new random things to do list! (see next post) Bored yet? If you are you can either:- 1) Go back to my site lukewarner.tk or 2) go to some other random site or 3) Do some other random thing! (have a look at my next post, Random things To Do) still reading? good . . . I will add new posts when I want to, or when I remember, or both or, I think there was another one . . . . but I can't remember it. OK I will tell u what it is when I do remember it. (u should no that I don't have a very good memory. My friends (yes I have friends) say that I am very well organized, and I have a very good memory. Suppose I am like Monica from that great show Friends. No. I am Stupid. I was trying not to remember that friends has gone off air. Boo Hoo anyways, back to the story . . . . oh yes, where was I. (see I am not organized, and I do not have a good memory) oh yes i remember now, iwas just saying good bye. ok bored (no I'm bored moron) cya Luke

While experimenting with random things, I have found the perfect thing. The little scrolling links bar, will be scraped, and instead, i will havea console, running down the left of my site!!!! I am currently experimenting at the mo. i know that my hompepage will have the console. This is the first page i will change it all to. The other pages on my site (there are lots) will probably have it on there as well. i know that i have been changing my site around a lot at the moment. I am hoping that this will be the last change. Remeber, it is all for the best. All the changes make my site look great (or better) anyway, so wth?
in case u hadn't noticed, (i have published the post at least 2 times) it is my birthday. I am not going mad, i just wanted to tell every one, that is why i have published the post lots of times.

Ha Today, it's the beginning of a new ear. Sorry. i mean Era. I am 14!!!! Whoooooooo OK after 3 1 2 2.5 (hahahahahah) 3 Happy Birthday to me Happy Birthday to me Happy Birthday to me Happy Birthday to meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! Now i can do 14 people things now!!!!

Ha It's the beginning of a new ear toady. Sorry. I mean a new Era. Ha. I am 14. Now i can do all the stuff that 14's do. OK After 3 1 2 2 1/2 3 Happy Birthday to Me Happy Birthday to Me Happy Birthday to Me Happy Birthday to Meeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!! Whooooooooo

We have not been selected i have been saved hang on, we still had to perform. oh hell, oh well wth. the good news is that we did't win. the bad news is that we still had to perform am i making any sense at all? good don't look at me in that tone of voice.

I have just been selected (or our group has been selected)to perform our play in front of the whole year. OK I'll start at the beginning if you are that desperate to hear the story. (yes - that means that there is someone on earth who is reading this. Whooooooo!!!) In English, (duuuuuh, of course this is at school) we have been writing reverse fairy tales. We had to write them, practice them, and then perform them to the rest of the group. We just did perform them, and our group came in the final two. The n we had to perform these again, to see who would win. We did. This means that we have to perform this crappy play in front of the whole year, and most of the teachers as well. I am so nervous. Maybe i should go to www.iamnervousecosihave2performmyplay2thewholeyeargroup.com hahahahahah if you believe that that website address is real, you need help man. (of course, if you are a woman, then, well, you probably need help too. Yes you do. I'll tell you why. U are actually bothering to read all of this junk). Seek it.

Ha It's my birthday in 4 days. I will (finally) be 12. i mean 14. Ha. Now i can do all the stuff that 14 year olds do. Ha. I wonder what that is????? Answers on a post card plese. I would like to point ot, that my profile is wrong. My birthday is 06/07/1990, but my star sign is Cancer (the crab) and my animal sign is the Horse, not what ever it says!!!!

My real name is Don te Moan. Hahahahahaha fooled you all didn't i? Yes, i know my site is lukewarner.tk, my hotmail is lwgw@hotmail.com, my log is called lukewarner, and i sign my blogs luke. i wanted to do this because i am a crazy immortal moron. i also wanted to see who would be taken in by my fake name!!!!! hahahahahahahahaha!
